ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, I (being a necro) have noticed many SK to not use the spells they do have effectively. Your best inviting spell is clinging darkness, and your best 2
ygData.messageBody:
Also, I (being a necro) have noticed many SK to not use the spells they do
have effectively. Your best inviting spell is clinging darkness, and your
best 2 spells(dunno after level 19, my wifes level) are shadowstep and fear.
Use them. Everyone says your spells suck, get your casting skills up and use
your spells. Fear combined with DOT spells and this archery skill could
become your greatest weapon.
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: David <milamber@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 5:06 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Archery


> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> I have put a couple of training points in to Archery and have fired a lot
of
> arrows at blue and above creatures, and haven't gained any experience and
I
> have been keeping watch on it. I have fired over 200 arrows and nothing.
> Is their any reason? or just plain bad luck. I think my pets and party
> members are getting mad at me becuse they want me to tank for them but I
> really want to increase my archery skill. I have a long bow with the
> standard arrows. Plus I couldn't find the book on making arrows in ....
the
> dark elf city ... Neriak(?) anyone know where it is?
>
> Thanks
>
> David
>
